TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlParserContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 所需的所有內容資訊以剖析 XML 片段。

span.span: Provides all the context information required by the to parse an XML fragment.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立讀取 XML 片段的物件。The following example creates an object that reads an XML fragment. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會提供所有`DocumentType`所需的資訊。This constructor supplies all `DocumentType` information required by . 如果這個`XmlParserContext`傳遞至，系統會忽略所有的 DTD 資訊。If this `XmlParserContext` is passed to an , all DTD information is ignored. 如果您傳遞做為 DTD `internalSubset`，DTD 用於實體解析，而非用於文件驗證。If you pass a DTD as the `internalSubset`, the DTD is used for entity resolution, not for document validation. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`XmlParserContext`讀取 XML 片段。The following example uses an `XmlParserContext` to read an XML fragment. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlParserContext.XmlParserContext1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlParserContext.XmlParserContext1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlParserContext.XmlParserContext1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlParserContext.XmlParserContext1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the base URI.

value.span: 用來解析 DTD 檔案的基底 URI。

span.span: The base URI to use to resolve the DTD file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網路上的 XML 文件使用不同的 W3C 標準包含機制進行彙總的資料區塊所組成，因此可能包含來自不同位置的節點。A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated using various W3C standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore may contain nodes that come from different places. `BaseURI` 顯示這些節點的起源。`BaseURI` shows where these nodes originated.

summary.span: 取得或設定文件類型宣告的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the document type declaration.
The name of the document type declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性中，連同， ，和，提供所有文件類型宣告資訊。This property, along with , , and , provides all the document type declaration information. 它用來尋找和載入必要的 DTD 資訊，以便您取得所有的預設屬性和 DTD 中定義的實體。It is used to find and load the necessary DTD information so that you get all the default attributes and entities defined in the DTD.

summary.span: 取得或設定內部 DTD 子集。

span.span: Gets or sets the internal DTD subset.
The internal DTD subset.

value.span: 比方說，這個屬性會傳回所有項目方括號之間<！DOCTYPE 文件 [...]>.

span.span: For example, this property returns everything between the square brackets <!DOCTYPE doc [...]>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性中，連同， ，和，提供所有文件類型宣告資訊。This property, along with , , and , provides all the document type declaration information. 它用來尋找和載入必要的 DTD 資訊，以便您取得所有的預設屬性和 DTD 中定義的實體。It is used to find and load the necessary DTD information so that you get all the default attributes and entities defined in the DTD. DTD 用於實體解析，而非用於文件驗證。The DTD is used for entity resolution, not for document validation.
